## Detailed Step-by-Step: Template Comparison

```
Step 1: Trigger
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    Event: pull_request
    Conditions:
      âœ“ Target branch: main/master/develop
      âœ“ Changed paths: apps/**, infrastructure/**, charts/**

Step 2: Detect Environment
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    Check which values files changed:
      - values-development.yaml â†’ test development
      - values-staging.yaml     â†’ test staging
      - values-production.yaml  â†’ test production
    
    If apps/** changed â†’ test all environments

Step 3: Generate PR Manifests
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    For each environment:
      helm template argocd-apps ./charts/argocd-apps \
        --values values.yaml \
        --values values-${env}.yaml \
        > manifests-pr/${env}.yaml

Step 4: Generate Base Manifests
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    git checkout origin/${base_branch}
    
    For each environment:
      helm template argocd-apps ./charts/argocd-apps \
        --values values.yaml \
        --values values-${env}.yaml \
        > manifests-base/${env}.yaml
    
    git checkout ${pr_branch}

Step 5: Generate Diffs
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    For each environment:
      diff -u \
        manifests-base/${env}.yaml \
        manifests-pr/${env}.yaml \
        > diffs/${env}.diff

Step 6: Create Comment
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    Format:
      ## ğŸ” ArgoCD Diff Preview
      
      ### Environment: production
      <details>
        <summary>View diff (N lines)</summary>
        ```diff
        ... diff content ...
        ```
      </details>

Step 7: Upload Artifacts
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    Artifact: argocd-diff-preview
      â”œâ”€â”€ manifests-pr/
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ development.yaml
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ staging.yaml
      â”‚   â””â”€â”€ production.yaml
      â”œâ”€â”€ manifests-base/
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ development.yaml
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ staging.yaml
      â”‚   â””â”€â”€ production.yaml
      â”œâ”€â”€ diffs/
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ development.diff
      â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ staging.diff
      â”‚   â””â”€â”€ production.diff
      â””â”€â”€ diff-summary.md
```

## Integration with GitOps Flow

```
Developer Workflow:
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

1. Developer makes changes
   â””â”€> git checkout -b feature/update-app
   â””â”€> Edit apps/my-app/deployment.yaml
   â””â”€> git commit -m "Update app to v2.0"
   â””â”€> git push origin feature/update-app

2. Create Pull Request
   â””â”€> PR opened on GitHub
   â””â”€> GitHub Actions triggered

3. Review Process
   â”œâ”€> CI/CD runs tests
   â”œâ”€> ArgoCD diff preview generated â—„â”€â”€ THIS WORKFLOW
   â”œâ”€> Security scans run
   â””â”€> Team reviews PR + diff

4. Approval & Merge
   â””â”€> Reviewer approves
   â””â”€> PR merged to main

5. ArgoCD Sync (Auto)
   â”œâ”€> ArgoCD detects Git change (within ~3 min)
   â”œâ”€> Compares desired state vs actual state
   â”œâ”€> Applies changes to cluster
   â””â”€> Updates app status

6. Monitoring
   â””â”€> Team monitors deployment
   â””â”€> ArgoCD shows sync status
   â””â”€> Apps become healthy
```

## Security Model

```
GitHub Secrets (Encrypted)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    ARGOCD_AUTH_TOKEN
    ARGOCD_SERVER
          â”‚
          â”œâ”€> Only accessible during workflow execution
          â”œâ”€> Not visible in logs
          â””â”€> Not accessible to forks (for security)
          
Workflow Permissions
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    â”œâ”€> contents: read      (read Git repo)
    â”œâ”€> pull-requests: write (post comments)
    â””â”€> None for cluster operations (template workflow)

ArgoCD Service Account (Live Diff)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    â”œâ”€> Read-only access to applications
    â”œâ”€> Cannot modify cluster state
    â”œâ”€> Cannot access secrets
    â””â”€> Limited to 'argocd' namespace
```

---

## Key Takeaways

âœ… **Workflow 1 (Template)** is recommended for most use cases
- No cluster access required
- Fast and secure
- Easy to set up

âš¡ **Workflow 2 (Live)** is for advanced scenarios
- Shows real-time cluster diff
- Accounts for manual changes
- Requires additional setup

ğŸ”’ **Security First**
- Use read-only tokens
- Minimize permissions
- Rotate credentials regularly

ğŸ“Š **Review Before Merge**
- Always check the diff preview
- Download artifacts for detailed review
- Test in lower environments first
